title._content: Birds-eye view of the Camp of the Army of Occupation, commanded by Gen. Taylor. Near Corpus Christi, Texas, (from the North) Oct. 1845.

description._content: Title: Birds-eye view of the Camp of the Army of Occupation, commanded by Gen. Taylor. Near Corpus Christi, Texas, (from the North) Oct. 1845. Creator: Whiting, Daniel Powers, 1808-1892; Parsons, Charles, 1821-1910 (lithographer) Date: October 1845 Part Of: Army portfolio Place: Corpus Christi, Texas Description: Lithograph of a sketch of a valley near Monterrey, with numbers indicating points of interest from the Battle of Monterrey and corresponding captions. Physical Description: 1 print: lithograph, part of 1 portfolio (5 prints); 48 x 61 cm File: ag2002_1439x_1_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/mex/id/1685
